A library for simulating
operations on sets of qubits
Operations run a simple qubit
example on one edit the COMMON
CONFIG section at the
beginning of makefile in the
root directory Change perform
rotations and verify that the
state vector of probability
amplitudes is still normalized
OpenMP is enabled by default
To change the number of
threads used by the set the
value of OMP_NUM_THREADS
before running the eg export
copy from the examples folder
into the root eg use the job
submission script examples
ompJob sh The initial example
file available in the root
folder is the template file
basicTemplate c If you have
removed this 		file

copy from the examples folder
into the root eg use the job
submission script examples
ompJob sh The initial example
file available in the root
folder is the template file
basicTemplate c If you have
removed this it is also
available in examples
basicTemplate c The structure
of this file leave the
initialization and cleanup
sections and edit the
measurement and phase gate
sections Further explanations
are in the template file The
full list of QUEST library
functions that can be used
here is listed in qubits h To
run over several nodes with 		MPI

A library for simulating
operations on sets of qubits
Operations run a simple qubit
example on one edit the COMMON
CONFIG section at the
beginning of makefile in the
root directory Change perform
rotations and verify that the
state vector of probability
amplitudes is still normalized
OpenMP is enabled by default
To change the number of
threads used by the set the
value of OMP_NUM_THREADS
before running the eg export
copy from the examples folder
into the root eg use the job
submission script examples
ompJob sh The initial example
file available in the root
folder is the template file
basicTemplate c If you have
removed this it is also
available in examples
basicTemplate c The structure
of this file leave the
initialization and cleanup
sections and edit the
measurement and phase gate
sections Further explanations
are in the template file The
full list of QUEST library
functions that can be used
here is listed in qubits h To
run over several nodes with
edit the COMMON CONFIG section
at the beginning of makefile
Change use the job submission
script examples mpiJob sh Note
that the API to the QUEST
library is unchanged when
running on multiple nodes The
template file basicTemplate c
is valid for both single and
multi node environments Copy
Doxygen_doc html to a device
with an internet browser Open
Doxygen_doc html index html 		Otherwise

Variable Documentation

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change COMPILER
Initial value:
GNU to COMPILER=INTEL. Then run:

```
make clean
make
./demo 8
```

This will report some information about the size of the system

Definition at line 22 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg

Definition at line 42 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg use the job submission script examples ompJob sh The initial example file available in the root folder is the template file basicTemplate c If you have removed this it is also available in examples basicTemplate c The structure of this file leave the initialization and cleanup sections and edit the measurement and phase gate sections Further explanations are in the template file The full list of QUEST library functions that can be used here is listed in qubits h To run over several nodes with MPI

Definition at line 42 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg MY_FILE_NAME
Initial value:
timingDemo 

Change the name of the executable as desired eg EXE=myProg.

Run with:
```
make clean
make
./myProg [NUMBER OF QUBITS] 
```
To run on arcus-b on one node

Definition at line 42 of file README.md.

Definition at line 20 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export OMP_NUM_THREADS
Initial value:
16. See examples/ompJob.sh for an example of how to do this in a job submission script.



There are other examples of codes using the QUEST library in the examples folder. To use one of these

Definition at line 33 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg use the job submission script examples ompJob sh The initial example file available in the root folder is the template file basicTemplate c If you have removed this it is also available in examples basicTemplate c The structure of this file leave the initialization and cleanup sections and edit the measurement and phase gate sections Further explanations are in the template file The full list of QUEST library functions that can be used here is listed in qubits h To run over several nodes with edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile Change use the job submission script examples mpiJob sh Note that the API to the QUEST library is unchanged when running on multiple nodes The template file basicTemplate c is valid for both single and multi node environments Copy Doxygen_doc html to a device with an internet browser Open Doxygen_doc html index html Otherwise

Definition at line 22 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg use the job submission script examples ompJob sh The initial example file available in the root folder is the template file basicTemplate c If you have removed this it is also available in examples basicTemplate c The structure of this file leave the initialization and cleanup sections and edit the rotations

Definition at line 42 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg use the job submission script examples ompJob sh The initial example file available in the root folder is the template file basicTemplate c If you have removed this it is also available in examples basicTemplate c The structure of this file leave the initialization and cleanup sections and edit the measurement and phase gate sections Further explanations are in the template file The full list of QUEST library functions that can be used here is listed in qubits h To run over several nodes with edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile Change USE_MPI
Initial value:
0 to USE_MPI=1.

Run with:
```
make clean
make
mpirun -np [NUMBER OF PROCESSES] ./demo [NUMBER OF QUBITS]
```
To run on arcus-b

Definition at line 74 of file README.md.
